title: Why can't I deactivate "Colorblind Mode"?
body:
Every game I deactive the colorblind mode and then press "Okay" if I check the menu again its unchecked but in the next game it checked/activated again.

any idea?

replies.body:
There might be a settings corruption preventing your config from saving properly.  A config reset should fix this:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
